mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM SYS_USERS
AND USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sysUsers.userName },'%')
AND LOGIN_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sysUsers.loginName },'%')
ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT
FROM SYS_USERS
AND USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userName },'%')
AND LOGIN_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{loginName },'%')
ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
